name: Broken Rib Cowl
description: A quick and easy cowl using exactly one skein of Malabrigo Mecha. Perfect for chilly days.
category: Neck / Torso → Scarf Neck / Torso → Cowl
full_text: A quick and easy cowl using exactly one skein of Malabrigo Mecha. Perfect for chilly days. One size only. Materials 1 Skein of Malabrigo Mecha or minimum of 120m /130y of chunky weight yarn 5.0mm and 6.0 mm 16” circular needles or 40” circular for magic loop Stitch marker(s) Darning Needle Note: You can adjust the width/length of the cowl, but you will need to increase your yarn amount. This pattern is designed to use exactly one skein.
